TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SoapFormatter extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IRemotingFormatter, class System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatter
Public NotInheritable Class SoapFormatter Implements IRemotingFormatter
type SoapFormatter = class interface IRemotingFormatter interface IFormatter

summary.span: 以 SOAP 格式将对象或整个连接对象的图形序列化和反序列化。

span.span: Serializes and deserializes an object, or an entire graph of connected objects, in SOAP format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 从 .NET Framework 2.0 开始，此类已过时。Beginning with the .NET Framework 2.0, this class is obsolete. [!INCLUDE[binaryformatter](~/includes/binaryformatter.md)] 和 类实现接口， 以支持 (rpc) 的远程过程调用，以及 ) (继承的接口， 以支持对象图形的序列化。The and classes implement the interface to support remote procedure calls (RPCs), and the interface (inherited by the ) to support serialization of a graph of objects. 类还支持对对象进行 rpc ，无需使用此 功能。The class also supports RPCs with objects, without using the functionality. 在 Rpc 过程中， 接口允许指定两个单独的对象图：要序列化的对象的图形，以及包含一个标头对象数组的附加关系图，该数组用于传递有关远程函数调用的信息 (例如，事务 ID 或方法签名) 。During RPCs, the interface allows the specification of two separate object graphs: the graph of objects to serialize, and an additional graph that contains an array of header objects that convey information about the remote function call (for example, transaction ID or a method signature). 若要进行正确的序列化，第一个关系图的根对象必须是实现 接口或接口的对象 。For proper serialization, the root object of the first graph must be an object that implements either the interface or the interface. 在 RPC 的反序列化过程中， 会将委托指定给 格式化程序的方法。During deserialization of an RPC, a delegate is specified to the method of the formatter. 远程处理基础结构使用 委托生成支持接口的对象 。The remoting infrastructure uses the delegate to produce an object that supports the interface. 此对象包含存储在标头中的信息，并成为反序列化程序返回的关系图的根。This object contains the information stored in the headers, and becomes the root of the graph returned by the deserializer. 还可以处理通过实现接口的对象生成的 rpc 。The can also handle RPCs that are produced with objects that implement the interface. 若要在不使用该功能的情况下创建 RPC ，请 在要序列化的图形的根位置放置一个支持接口的对象。To create an RPC without using the functionality, place an object that supports the interface at the root of a graph being serialized. 若要对以这种方式创建的 RPC 进行反序列化 ，则必须将属性设置为支持该接口的另一个对象 ，并包含相关的远程调用信息。To deserialize an RPC created in this manner the property must be set to another object that supports the interface, and contains the relevant remote call information. ## TimeSpan 序列化TimeSpan Serialization 根据 ISO 8601：1998部分 5.5.3.2.1 "备用" 标准序列化 TimeSpan 对象。TimeSpan objects are serialized according to the ISO 8601: 1998 section 5.5.3.2.1 "Alternative" standard. ## 版本信息Version Information 不 支持 .NET Framework 版本之间的序列化兼容性。The does not support serialization compatibility between versions of the .NET Framework. 框架中版本1.1 和2.0 类型之间的序列化通常会失败。Serialization between versions 1.1 and 2.0 types in the Framework often fails. 可以采取以下措施来解决此问题：The following actions can be taken to remedy this issue: - 转换为使用 ，它提供1.1 和2.0 之间的兼容性。Convert to use the , which provides compatibility between 1.1 and 2.0. - 将现有的持久化数据转换为新格式。Convert existing persisted data to the new format. - 将序列化数据的所有制造者和使用者转换为版本2.0。Convert all producers and consumers of serialized data to version 2.0. - 避免使用从1.1 更改为2.0 的类型。Avoid using types that changed from 1.1 to 2.0. ## Examples [!code-cpp[SoapFormatter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapFormatter Example/CPP/soapformatter.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapFormatter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapFormatter Example/CS/soapformatter.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapFormatter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapFormatter Example/VB/soapformatter.vb#1)]

summary.span: 使用指定的 和 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象被序列化到指定的或从指定的反序列化 。Objects are serialized to, or deserialized from, the specified . 序列化或反序列化进程使用指定的 来搜索为要反序列化的对象类型注册的代理项。The serialization or deserialization process uses the specified to search for surrogates that are registered for the object types you want to deserialize. 代理项是对特定类的对象进行序列化和反序列化的帮助器。Surrogates are helpers that serialize and deserialize objects of specific classes. 默认情况下， 无法处理派生自的对象的序列化， 以便进行远程处理。The default cannot handle the serialization of objects that derive from the for remoting purposes. 在远程处理情况下，指定的将 派生自的对象替换为 由指定代理项选择器序列化的对象。In a remoting situation the specified replaces the object derived from with a object that is serialized by the specified surrogate selector. 因此，如果要使用远程对象，请将参数设置 `selector` 为的实例 。Therefore, if you want to use remote objects, set the `selector` parameter to an instance of . 如果不需要代理项，请将 `selector` 参数设置为 `null` 。If you do not need surrogates, set the `selector` parameter to be `null`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供一个枚举，该枚举描述给定序列化流的源和目标，并提供一种序列化以保留该上下文和其他调用方定义的上下文的方法。The provides an enumeration that describes the source and the destination for a given serialized stream, as well as a way for serialization to retain that context and an additional caller-defined context.

summary.span: 将流反序列化为对象图形。

span.span: Deserializes a stream into an object graph.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object Deserialize(class System.IO.Stream serializationStream) cil managed
Public Function Deserialize (serializationStream As Stream) As Object
abstract member Deserialize : System.IO.Stream -> obj override this.Deserialize : System.IO.Stream -> obj

param.name: serializationStream
param.span: 包含要反序列化的数据的流。

span.span: The stream that contains the data to deserialize.

summary.span: 反序列化所提供流中的数据并重新组成对象图形。

span.span: Deserializes the data on the provided stream and reconstitutes the graph of objects.

returns.span: 反序列化的图形的顶级对象（根）。

span.span: The top object of the deserialized graph (root).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要成功进行反序列化，流中的当前位置必须位于对象图的开头。For successful deserialization, the current position in the stream must be at the beginning of the object graph. Public Function Deserialize (serializationStream As Stream, handler As HeaderHandler) As Object

abstract member Deserialize : System.IO.Stream * System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.HeaderHandler -> obj override this.Deserialize : System.IO.Stream * System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.HeaderHandler -> obj

param.name: serializationStream
param.span: 包含要反序列化的数据的流。

param.span: 对在流中发现的任何标题进行处理的委托。

span.span: Delegate to handle any headers found on the stream.
Can be .

summary.span: 将流反序列化为对象图形，该流中的任何标题都由给定的 进行处理。

span.span: Deserializes the stream into an object graph with any headers in that stream being handled by the given .

returns.span: 反序列化的图形的顶级对象（根）。

span.span: The top object of the deserialized graph (root).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标头仅用于特定的远程处理应用程序。Headers are used only for specific remoting applications. 参数是从 SOAP 远程过程调用 (RPC) 格式的流中返回标头的两种方法之一。The parameter is one of two ways to return headers from a stream in SOAP Remote Procedure Call (RPC) format. 另一种方法是使用 属性。The other way is to use the property. 若要成功进行反序列化，流中的当前位置必须位于对象图的开头。For successful deserialization, the current position in the stream must be at the beginning of the object graph. ## TimeSpan 序列化TimeSpan Serialization 根据 ISO 8601：1998部分 5.5.3.2.1 "备用" 标准序列化 TimeSpan 对象。TimeSpan objects are serialized according to the ISO 8601: 1998 section 5.5.3.2.1 "Alternative" standard. [!INCLUDE [untrusted-data-method-note](~/includes/untrusted-data-method-note.md)]

span.span: is .
supports seeking, and its length is 0.

value.span: 表示当前自动反序列化级别的 。

span.span: The that represents the current automatic deserialization level.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支持的值为 并 (默认) 。Supported values are and (the default). 有关反序列化级别的详细信息，请参阅 [.Net 远程处理中的自动反序列化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/5dxse167(v=vs.100))。For details about deserialization levels, see [Automatic Deserialization in .NET Remoting](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/5dxse167(v=vs.100)).

value.span: 将 SOAP 顶级对象反序列化为的 。

span.span: The into which the SOAP top object is deserialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于 SOAP 远程过程调用 (RPC) 格式，并指定 SOAP top 记录是远程调用的方法，而不是公共语言运行时对象类型。This property is used for SOAP remote procedure call (RPC) format and specifies that the SOAP top record is a method called remotely, not a common language runtime object type.

span.span: The format in which type descriptions are laid out in the serialized stream.
